DOC.brief_summary: Study to assess the safety profile of meloxicam by comparing incidence of gastrointestinal adverse events of meloxicam with that of NSAID in the routine daily therapeutic situation.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Meloxicam Compared to Other Nonsteroidal Antiinflammatory Drugs (NSAIDs) in an Observational Cohort Study of Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis, Osteoarthritis, Lumbago, Scapulohumeral Periarthritis, Neck, Shoulder and Arm Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Patients with Indications according to the package insert of the prescribed NSAID There is no exclusion criterion, because this Post Marketing Study is an observational study
